data.message: Yeah, OK dude. I think you're just a little bit confused. Ya see, true freedom's been renewed and even your suppose-ed hero 2Pac Amaru Shakur knew the truth. But, hey, nevermind him, ask KRS or Blueprint At least Printmatic's got a clue. Maybe even Emanon, too. Slim, I hate to tell you, but you're just a freemason's tool. If you're not the real bitch, prove me wrong, call out your illuminati crew. D.T's calling em out. That's why they're tricking you out. But it's cool, keep bending over with a baphomet dick in mouth. ✌

replies.message: What the actual fuck are you trying to say LMFAO
Like line by line? Or just in general? What's your reading level? How far do I need to dumb it down? Do you follow politics?
That was just a bunch of mumbo-jumbo.
